panels.description: This graph presents the rate of requests that were completed within the given time. E.g. the 0.1s graph contains all the requests that happened in less and 0.05s and 0.05s-0.1s, 0.25s graph contains all the requests for 0.1s graph plus the requests between 0.1s and 0.25s, etc...
